name: Jessica Fleuti
bio: Jessica has 10+ years of experience delivering programs at the intersection of innovation, policy, and social impact. As Curator of Convenings at the Skoll Foundation, she designs convening programs that highlight innovations in social impact and connect social entrepreneurs to others working to solve the worldâ€™s most pressing problems. Prior to joining the Skoll Foundation, Jessica led programs for Net Impact, the World Affairs Council, and Council on Foreign Relations. She started her career as an investigator at the California Appellate Project, a nonprofit that handles the appeals of death row inmates.
